Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents a person employed by the company.

name.description: The full name of the employee.

position.description: The employee's job title or position.

accountNumber.description: The employee's bank account number for payroll.

AttendanceRecord.title: Attendance Record
AttendanceRecord.description: Represents an employee's attendance record for a specific day.

date.description: The date of the attendance record.

morningEntry.description: The time the employee clocked in in the morning.

afternoonEntry.description: The time the employee clocked in in the afternoon.

overtimeHours.description: The number of overtime hours worked.

/employees/{employeeId}/attendance/{atte.description: Stores attendance records for a specific employee.

/attendance/{date}/records/{employeeId}.description: Stores attendance records for a specific day, grouped by employee.
